title: Anyone who thinks we won , come in.

replies.msg:
Carrie Lam(b) was just ‘proposed’ to withdraw the Extradition Bill . Legislative council is still controlled by PRO-China Legislator . Which means there are still chance they will reject the 'Extradition Bill withdrawal' proposal

https://twitter.com/YanWa369/status/1169231939133296640
Please don’t trust Chinazi

全面抵制藍色餐廳
一齊打經濟戰

https://www.google.com/maps/d/viewer?mid=10SCYSkgC9KMC_kAGtLChlGRLWVbk8NTs&shorturl=1&ll=22.289809900000016,114.1965917&z=17

【831 太子站目擊者立法會見記者】
31/8 Prince Edward MTR station Undifferentiated attack (by police) witness press conference

-有一個人失蹤
One of the protester is still missing

-有機會有一個人死左 比警察打左半個鐘 嘔白泡 差佬見佢冇反應 之後冇打 二三十分鐘後由消防員 非救護人員 送走 完全冇反應
One of the protester was beaten by police for 30 mins straight.

-差佬同佢地講強姦佢地係正常
Police said it is 'normal' for a female protester get raped (by the police)

-有被捕人士係警署被非禮 (摸胸)
Sexual Harassment ( Policeman touched Female protester 's breast )

-係警署去廁所時不能關門 而當時有其他性別既警員在埋
Protesters were not allowed to close the door when they were going to the toilet

-有日本人被捕 警方拒絕比佢聯繫大使館
A Japanese people was arrested and police rejected to let him contact the JP embassy.

-速龍落電梯 踩住市民背部甚至頭部落
Special Forces stepped on people's back (or even head ) when they were going down stairs

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1OUY6KJZyUQ
